desc.zh-Hans:
注意：与现实的新阳市无关！！！
新阳市是我所虚构幻想的城市，这座城市有两千五百多万人口，而地铁公司为了顺应城市的发展共建设了18条地铁线路，包含2条S线，一条铁路区域线。
在平行世界的1991年，新阳市开通了1号线和3号线，从此进入了地铁时代。到如今已经建设规划完成，目前因满足新阳市市民的出行需求地铁公司决定在近二十年内不再规划新地铁。
线路    编组  首通时间
1号线   6B     1991.5.1
2号线   6A     1994.5.1
3号线   6A     1991.5.1
4号线   6B     2004.10.1
5号线   6A     2008.8.1
6号线   8A     2011.5.1
7号线   6B     2012.6.1
8号线：6A    2004.10.1
9号线：6B    2005.12.28
10号线：8A  2012.6.1
11号线：6A  2016.6.1
12号线：6B  2016.12.28
13号线：8A  2014.5.1
14号线：8A  2013.10.1
15号线：8D  2023.5.1
16号线：6A  2017.4.30
  S1线：  8A  2022.12.28
  S2线：  6A  2021.8.1
desc.en:
Warming: Nothing to do with the real city of Xinyang!!!!
Xinyang City is my fictional fantasy city, the city has a population of more than 25 million people, and the metro company has built a total of 18 metro lines in order to keep up with the development of the city, including 2 S lines and a railway regional line.
In the parallel world of 1991, Xinyang City opened Line 1 and Line 3, from then on into the underground era. To date, the construction plan has been completed, and now due to meet the travelling needs of the citizens of Sinyang City, the metro company has decided not to plan a new metro in the last 20 years.
Line Grouping First Opening Time
Line 1 6B 1991.5.1
Line 2 6A 1994.5.1
Line 3 6A 1991.5.1
Line 4 6B 2004.10.1
Line 5 6A 2008.8.1
Line 6 8A 2011.5.1
Line 7 6B 2012.6.1
Line 8: 6A 2004.10.1
Line 9: 6B 2005.12.28
Line 10: 8A 2012.6.1
Line 11: 6A 2016.6.1
Line 12: 6B 2016.12.28
Line 13: 8A 2014.5.1
Line 14: 8A 2013.10.1
Line 15: 8D 2023.5.1
Line 16: 6A 2017.4.30
  Line S1: 8A 2022.12.28
  Line S2: 6A 2021.8.1

reference: 爱发电,Tue Oct 22 2024 10:16:23 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)
